dialogue.htmlContent:
As you navigate through the labyrinthine passageways of Dominion's back-alleys, you start to hear the faint murmur of voices coming from somewhere up ahead. Proceeding with caution, you slowly make your way around the next corner, and find yourself [pc.stepping] into a well-kept courtyard, which is paved over in clean, grey cobblestones. Positioned in the very centre of this small square, there stands a finely-carved stone figure, depicting a beautiful human slave bowing her head in submission.

Continuing to move forwards, you see that multiple narrow entrances link three of this area's walled sides to the surrounding alleyways, while on the fourth there's a huge, open gateway, through which the sounds of a busy marketplace can be heard. The words 'Slaver Alley' have been cast into this gate's dull iron framing, while to either side of it, posters advertising a multitude of different slave traders have been plastered all over the weathered brick walls. A pair of muscular horse-boys are standing guard a little way inside, and from the fact that their attention is fixed entirely on looking inwards towards Slaver Alley, you suspect that their only job is to make sure that no runaway slaves slip past them.

#IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_MAGIC_STORM)

There doesn't seem to be any sign that these horse-boys are affected by the ongoing arcane storm, and as a particularly large bolt of pink lightning flashes across the sky, you see the faint shimmer of a vast arcane shield protecting both them and all of Slaver Alley from its effects.

#ELSE

While it's nowhere near as busy as the main streets of Dominion, this area still sees a relatively high level of foot traffic. As you've been standing here, several shoppers, often accompanied by one or more slaves, have already crossed the courtyard, heading either to or from the heavily-patrolled alleyway which leads back out to the city's busy boulevard.

#ENDIF

If you wanted to, you could pass through the gateway and enter Slaver Alley right now...

You find yourself standing in the gateway which links Slaver Alley to the rest of Dominion. On either side of this entrance, two horse-boy private security guards are keeping a watchful eye on anyone who passes through here; they're mostly focused on looking inwards towards Slavery Alley, as their primary duty is being on the lookout for any runaway slaves.

The brick walls to either side of this gateway have been plastered with promotional posters, and while the vast majority of them are advertising stores within Slaver Alley itself, you see plenty of others promoting everything from soft drinks to brothels in Dominion's red light district. #IF(pc.isQuestProgressGreaterThan(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_HELENA, QUEST_ROMANCE_HELENA_6_ADVERTISING)) True to their word, the guards have prevented anyone from pasting adverts over the six enchanted posters of Helena which you put up in this area. As customers to Slaver Alley pass you by, you hear some of them commenting on the harpy matriarch's beautiful appearance. #ELSE A large sign near to where the guards are standing declares that 'Permission must be obtained before putting up any advertisements!'. #ENDIF

The only place not plastered with these promotional posters is the spot where a touristy-looking information board has been screwed to the wall, and upon reading it, you discover that a powerful arcane shield has been erected over the entire area, which protects everyone beneath it from the lust-inducing effects of any ongoing arcane storm. True enough, as you glance up at the sky, you see the faint pink crackle of the shield's arcane energy, reassuring you that you needn't worry about attacks from any horny citizens.

Continuing to skim over the information board, you read that a person must be in possession of a slaver license before being able to buy or sell slaves. According to the next paragraph, these slaver licenses may be obtained from the 'Slaver Administration' building, which is apparently only a short distance away from where you're currently standing.
You'd better speak to the guards before starting to put up Helena's posters...

Knowing that Helena is expecting you to immediately get on with your task, you [pc.walk] directly over to the entrance of Slaver Alley, where you see that two horse-boy guards are standing on duty. A large sign fixed to one of the nearby walls declares that 'Permission must be obtained before putting up any advertisements!', and as the two guards are keeping a close watch on you, there'd be no way to put up Helena's posters without being seen and stopped by them. Realising that you have no choice but to first obtain their permission, you step up to the older-looking of the two, who you assume to be the one in charge, and ask him if you could put your six posters up.

[style.speechMasculineStrong(More posters, huh?)] he grunts, [style.speechMasculineStrong(Sure, you can put them up, but it's going to cost you a hundred flames.)]

#IF(pc.hasBreasts())

#IF(pc.isCoverableAreaExposed(CA_NIPPLES)) [style.speechMasculine(If you don't want to pay, you could let us get a good feel of your tits instead!)] #ELSE [style.speechMasculine(If you don't want to pay, you could flash us your tits instead!)] #ENDIF the second, younger horse-boy interjects, [style.speechMasculine(That'll keep me going until the end of my shift!)]

The older horse-boy grunts in approval at this suggestion, letting you know that if you wanted to avoid paying the hundred flame fee, you could always do as his subordinate suggests...

#ELSE

From their stern glares, you realise that there wouldn't be much point in trying to convince them to waive the fee, and so you're left with the choice of either paying up now, or returning to give them their money at another time...

#ENDIF

Producing the hundred flames asked of you, you hand them over to the senior of the two horse-boys. With an approving grunt and nod of his head he says, [style.speechMasculineStrong(Right, go on then, you can put your posters up.)]

Deciding to do as the younger guard suggests, you step forwards and push your [pc.breastSize] breasts out towards him, [pc.speech(Go on then, get a good feel!)]

Not hesitating for a moment, the horse-boy greedily reaches out and grabs your tits, letting out a horny grunt as he playfully squeezes your [pc.nipples] between his rough fingers. Not wanting to miss out on the action, the second horse-boy steps over and joins the first in groping your breasts, grinning lecherously at your exposed [pc.nipples] as you unwittingly let out [pc.a_moan+].

[style.speechMasculine(Fucking nice... That'll do for me!)] the younger horse-boy declares, giving your tits one final squeeze before stepping back to his post.

[style.speechMasculineStrong(Yeah, that'll keep me going until I can get a good fuck once my shift's over,)] his superior says, similarly giving your [pc.nipples+] one last pinch before stepping back. Waving his hand at the walls, he declares, [style.speechMasculineStrong(Go on then, you can put your posters up now!)]

Deciding to do as the younger guard suggests, you shift aside your clothing so that your [pc.breastSize] breasts and [pc.nipples+] are fully exposed. Pointing them in the direction of the two guards, you ask, [pc.speech(Is this what you wanted to see?)]

[style.speechMasculine(Oh yeah, those're fucking nice!)] the younger horse-boy declares, grinning lustfully at your tits.

[style.speechMasculineStrong(Yeah, that'll keep me going until I can get a good fuck once my shift's over,)] his superior says while starting hungrily at your [pc.nipples]. Letting out a satisfied sigh, he waves his hand at the walls and declares, [style.speechMasculineStrong(Go on then, you can put your posters up now!)]

Moving your clothing back into their previous position, you prepare to do as the guard says...

Taking a look at the walls on either side of the gateway, you see that they're already completely plastered with advertisements, and there's not a single free spot available where you can put up yours. Sensing what it is you're thinking, the younger of the two horse-boy guards says, [style.speechMasculine(Just paste them over some other poster; someone else will be along to do the same to yours before too long anyway.)]

Hoping that that doesn't turn out to be the case, you unroll the first of the posters, and relying on its enchantment to stick itself to the wall, you press it down over the top of an advertisement for Starr cigarettes. Sure enough, the poster adheres to the wall without need for any glue, and after [pc.stepping] back and admiring the moving image of Helena posing in her bikini, you move over and get started on putting up the next one. Before you're able to do so, however, the senior horse-boy lets out a low whistle and comments, [style.speechMasculineStrong(Damn... I'm sure I've seen her on the cover a magazine before. Is she one of those harpy queens or something?)]

Replying in the affirmative, you finish putting up the next poster, which causes the younger of the two horse-boys to excitedly comment, [style.speechMasculine(Woah! This one's in a different pose to the last! Look at her tits! Harpies don't usually have them that big!)]

Sure enough, this second poster you've just put up shows Helena in a different pose to the first; provocatively leaning forwards towards the viewer, she's gently swaying her body from side-to-side, which is causing her [helena.cupSize]-cup breasts to ponderously swing back and forth. Urged to continue by the two horse-boys, you put up the third poster beside the second, before [pc.stepping] over to the opposite wall and putting up the remaining three on that side. Each of the six posters turns out to display a bikini-clad Helena in an unique pose, and as you finish putting up the last one, the senior horse-boy comments, [style.speechMasculineStrong(There's no way I'm letting anyone put their posters over the top of these! Damn... This job suddenly became a lot more bearable!)]

Before you can respond to this, you suddenly notice a dark figure quickly approaching from one side, and you turn to see that it's none other than Scarlett herself. With the usual scowl on her face, she's making her way directly towards you, and you wonder what it is she wants...
Telling the guards that you'll come back to put up the posters another time, you step back and prepare to continue on your way...

Completely ignoring the two horse-boy guards, Scarlett walks up right in front of you and flatly states, [scarlett.speech(You're finally done with putting those stupid fucking posters up? Helena's got something else for you to do now.)]

[style.speechMasculine(I'd hardly call them stupid,)] the younger horse-boy comments as he hears what it is that Scarlett's saying.

[scarlett.speech(How about you shut the fuck up, you dumb fucking cunt? I wasn't fucking talking to you!)] the foul-mouthed harpy snaps, before turning back to you and ordering, [scarlett.speech(Follow me back to the store.)]

Before you can ask any further questions, the rude harpy simply turns her back on you and marches off. Leaving the younger horse-boy guard complaining to his senior about the mannerisms of harpies, you prepare to follow Scarlett back to Helena's Boutique...

You find yourself walking down one of Slaver Alley's numerous interconnected passageways. Lined with clean, grey cobblestone, and being almost as wide as a normal street, they're quite unlike the regular sort of passages that make up the rest of Dominion's back-alleys. #IF(game.isDayTime()) Colourful canvas awnings have been unfurled from the sides of the surrounding buildings, and, looking up through the gap in the middle, you see a faint pink crackle evidence of the shield that protects Slaver Alley from arcane storms. #ELSE A series of arcane-powered lights cast a flickering glow over the area, and as you look up at the night sky, you see a faint pink crackle evidence of the shield that protects Slaver Alley from arcane storms. #ENDIF

Although not as busy as Dominion's main streets, there are still a significant amount of people wandering about, and you often have to push your way through small crowds that inexplicably decide to loiter right in the middle of the path. The close proximity of the surrounding buildings echoes and amplifies the crowd's inane chatter, making Slaver Alley feel more alive than any other part of the city you've wandered through.

The most striking feature of this area is the manner of goods that are sold here. Down each passageway, multiple wooden stands have been erected, and on top each one, slaves of all different races and sexes are being publicly displayed. You see that information boards have been attached to each one of these stands, giving you instructions as to which shop you need to visit in order to negotiate the purchase of the wares on display.

Glancing up at the slaves as you pass, you notice that the one thing they all have in common is that they're all wearing metal collars of some sort or another. Apart from that peculiar accessory, the vast majority of them are completely naked, although you do see a few that have been dressed in skimpy pieces of highly-revealing clothing.

With its concealed entrance originally revealed to you by [sean.name], this hidden alleyway is once again completely deserted. Even if its location were widely known, you can't imagine why anyone would willingly come back here, as there's absolutely nothing to see except dilapidated brickwork and the odd weed poking up through the cracked concrete path.

There really isn't anything to do here except turn around and leave...

In the far right corner of Slaver Alley's main square, sits the slaver shop, 'A Woman's Touch'. The delicate pink lettering which proudly displays this establishment's name is painted over the dark purple silhouette of an hourglass-shaped woman.

Just like all the other slaver stores, large glass windows are set into the frontage, allowing passers-by to check out what goods are on offer as they walk past. As you find yourself approaching the entrance, a very delicate-looking cat-girl, who you assume to be one of the shop assistants, steps out in front of you and curtsies. [genericFemale.speech(Please excuse me, [pc.Sir], but would you be interested in browsing our stock? We have new slaves finishing our training regimen every day, who are then ready for purchasing. You won't find girls anywhere else who are as well-trained and obedient as the ones we offer.)]

#IF pc.isHasSlaverLicense() #THEN

[pc.speech(Alright,)] you reply, [pc.speech(I can take a look around.)]

Smiling at you in delight, the cat-girl leads you inside the store, and as you're shown around, you notice a few slaves on offer that you might be interested in...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(Can anyone buy these slaves, then?)] you ask.

[genericFemale.speech(Oh, please forgive me, [pc.Sir]! I assumed you had a slaver license. Please do come back if you were ever to obtain one,)] the cat-girl hastily explains, curtsying once more before disappearing back into the shop.

#ENDIF

In the far left corner of Slaver Alley's main square, there's a slave shop that's quite unlike most of the others. Whereas all the other buildings that you've passed have had ornately-painted signs and decorative frontages, the one before you is of a plain wooden finish, and has it's name, 'Iron & Steel', burnt into the framework.

Most of the other shops have large glass windows by which to show off their goods to passers-by, but this one goes a step further, and the whole wooden frontage is actually a series of cleverly-designed sliding panels, about half of which have been pulled to one side. Looking into the open store, you see that all the slaves within appear to be males, and as you pass, a bulky cow-boy steps out and blocks your way, before cheerfully booming, [genericMale.speech(Taking a good look at our stock, I see! Why not come on in?! I'm sure we've got the right guy for you! Breeding studs, manual labourers, even pretty-boy models! We've got it all!)]

#IF pc.isHasSlaverLicense() #THEN

[pc.speech(Maybe a quick look,)] you reply, stepping forwards alongside the smiling cow-boy into the store...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(I don't have a licence, I'm afraid,)] you reply, continuing on past the salesman.

[genericMale.speech(Well, if you ever get one, then you know where to visit for the best male slaves in the city!)] the cow-boy shouts after you, before disappearing back into his shop.

#ENDIF

On one of the three sides of the square, a shop proudly displays an ass-shaped sign bearing the words, 'The Rear Entrance'. Knowing exactly what sort of slaves must be sold in there, you take a look through the large glass windows as you pass. Sure enough, you see that the slaves on display are all making sure to show off their asses, each of which is decorated by either a plain or jewelled butt-plug.

As you walk past the front door, a short cat-boy darts out to block your path, before placing his hands on his hips and grinning cheekily at you. [genericMale.speech(You like butts, right?! Come on inside! We've got the best asses in all of Dominion, and each and every one of our slaves have been specially trained to love anal sex!)]

#IF pc.isHasSlaverLicense() #THEN

[pc.speech(Ok,)] you reply, stepping forwards alongside the diminutive cat-boy into his store...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(I don't have a licence, I'm afraid,)] you reply, continuing on past the salesman.

[genericMale.speech(Well, you know where to visit as soon as you get one!)] the cat-boy squeaks, before rushing back into his shop.

#ENDIF

On the far side of the square, a slave shop has had its frontage painted all in white, and in flowing pink lettering, the name 'White Lilies' is painted beside an artistic depiction of a bunch of the very same flowers. It's quite clear from the feminine decor, as well as the fact that all of the naked slaves in the windows are showing off their well-kept pussies, that this particular store specialises in slaves who are in possession of female genitals.

As you walk past the front door, a beautiful white-furred rabbit-girl steps out towards you, and in a refined tone she asks, [genericFemale.speech(Why hello there, would you be interested at all in browsing some of my wares? I can assure you that all of the slaves sold in my establishment are virgins, and have undergone specialist training so as to desire nothing more than to have their feminine sex broken in by their new owner. Would you like to be their first, I wonder?)]

#IF pc.isHasSlaverLicense() #THEN

[pc.speech(I've got a few minutes to spare,)] you reply, stepping forwards alongside the regal rabbit-girl into her store...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(I don't have a licence, I'm afraid,)] you reply, continuing on past the salesman.

[genericFemale.speech(Ah, that is a shame. Well, if you ever do acquire one, then please visit us again,)] the rabbit-girl says, smiling politely at you before stepping back into her shop.

#ENDIF

On one side of the square, a rather shabby-looking slave store bears a mouth-shaped sign displaying the words, 'Viva Voce'. Beneath this, someone's scrawled some graffiti, and as you step forwards to take a closer look, you see that whoever wrote it wasn't the best at spelling, as it reads: 'It meens speakin fanci'.

Having satisfied your curiosity, you turn to leave, but find that a very shady-looking rat-boy is blocking your path. Before you can say anything, he grins and steps forwards, before nodding at the sign. [genericMale.speech(It's Latin, ain't it? I kinda inherited this place from me old man, an' he was the one who gave it that name. He was real smart, see, an' I kept on forgettin' what it meant, so I 'ad to leave meself that note there!)]

[pc.speech(Ah, so you're the owner,)] you say, but before you can continue, the rat-boy laughs and steps over towards the door.

[genericMale.speech(Yeah, tha's me! I kinda wanted to keep me old man's vision goin', see, so all me slaves fer sale 'ave been trained to love kissin', sucking cocks, eatin' girls out, all that kinda' stuff. We even 'ave a deal with some shady demon guy who give us these potions wot makes their lips all big and juicy! You comin' in to take a looksie? Y'won't regret it!)]

#IF pc.isHasSlaverLicense() #THEN

[pc.speech(Ok, sure, why not)] you reply, stepping forwards into the rat-boy's store...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(I don't have a licence,)] you reply. [pc.speech(Maybe another time.)]

[genericMale.speech(Ah, yeah, no worries. You jus' make sure to come 'ere once ya got one, alright?)] the rat-boy replies, letting out a cackling laugh as he steps back into the shadows.

#ENDIF

In the middle of a small square on one side of Slaver Alley, there sits a very striking statue. Made completely out of jet-black obsidian, and standing at least twelve feet from head-to-toe, it's a masterfully-crafted depiction of what appears to be a buxom female fallen angel, with wide hips and massive, GG-cup breasts.

Her huge, feathered wings reach up to the sky behind her, and, linked by heavy chains, bracers have been clasped around her delicate wrists and ankles. One of her hands is reaching down between her legs, where she's lewdly spreading her #IF(game.isGapeContentEnabled()) tentacled, gaping pussy #ELSE tentacled pussy #ENDIF for all to see, while the other is reaching around behind her back in order to dig her slender fingers into her exposed asshole.

Looking up at her face, you see that her beautiful features are contorted into an orgasmic scream, and, as evidence that her corruption has manifested itself into physical transformations other than just the one between her legs, an abnormally long tongue drops down out of her open mouth to push its way into one of her lip-shaped nipples, which appears in turn to be desperately sucking on the wet, squirming muscle.

This lewd statue sits upon a squat, stone pedestal, no higher than six feet or so, and as you approach, you see these words appear: 'My name is Marlel, once the humblest of all angels; Look upon my form, ye enemies of Lilith, and despair.'

From what Lyssieth told you, this is no ordinary statue, and is in fact the petrified form of the corrupted archangel Marlel. Lyssieth's eldest sister, Lirecea, is responsible for her current situation, and you wonder if you'll be able to force the elder lilin to revert the petrification process when you inevitably end up confronting her. Possessing no way to release Marlel from her stone prison, you let out a sigh, and, taking one last look at her lewd visage, you continue on your way...

Her huge, feathered wings reach up to the sky behind her, and, linked by heavy chains, bracers have been clasped around her delicate wrists and ankles. This lewd statue sits upon a squat, stone pedestal, no higher than six feet or so, and as you approach, you see these words appear: 'My name is Marlel, once the humblest of all angels; Look upon my form, ye enemies of Lilith, and despair.'

Nobody in the square seems to be paying much attention to the statue, and you doubt that there's anybody here who would know of the creator or what this piece of their art is meant to represent, other than what's apparent from the words inscribed upon the base. Letting out a sigh, you take one last look at the lewd visage of the fallen angel before you, before continuing on your way...

Deciding that you'd like to take a look inside one of the many shops that fill Slaver Alley, you approach the entrance to the nearest building. In order to display yet more slaves to passing customers, you see that a series of large glass windows have been installed into the walls before you. As you walk up to the entrance, some of the slaves standing behind these windows glance your way; no doubt wondering if you'll be their next owner.

Pushing open the door, you step inside the shop, and find that the interior is surprisingly clean, well-lit, and airy. Yet more slaves line the walls around you, and in the middle of the room, the shop's owner calls out to you from behind a circular wooden desk, [style.speechMasculine(Good [style.afternoon]! Are you here to hire some slaves for your business?)]

After answering in the negative, the shop owner informs you that his store is one of several throughout Slaver Alley which specialises in renting slaves to businesses. Apparently, most of his clients are managers of companies here in Dominion who occasionally have to rent slaves to cover for temporary labour shortages.

As this store is of no use to you, there's not much for you to do except say goodbye and [pc.step] back out into the street...

Flanked on both sides by a pair of huge warehouses, the store you find yourself standing in front of is without doubt the largest in all of Slaver Alley. Looking up at the large lettering that's printed across all three of these large buildings, you see that they're part of something called the 'Zaibatsu Exchange'.

While the warehouses are quite clearly not open to the public, you can see through the store's large windows that there are dozens of slaves on sale within. Wondering if you should go inside and take a look around, you [pc.walk] nearer to the front entrance, but as you approach, a wolf-girl guard steps forwards to bar your way and roughly growls, [style.speechFeminine(Hey! I don't recognise your face! You're not a member, are you?!)]

Realising that it would be far more trouble than it's worth to lie to this aggressive wolf-girl, you truthfully reply in the negative. Letting out a deep, throaty growl, she says, [style.speechFeminine(Then you'd better not be thinking about trying to go inside. This place is for members only.)]

Seeing no reason to cause a scene, you turn your back on the wolf-girl and [pc.walk] off back into Slaver Alley...

You find yourself standing in front of one of the cozy cafes which are scattered throughout Slaver Alley. Open twenty-four hours a day, seven days of the week, these establishments offer a place in which weary members of the public can rest and recuperate.

#IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) Looking through the front windows, you see that the cafe is currently very busy, with almost all of the tables being occupied. Despite this, however, you think that you'd be able to find a seat if you wanted to go inside and get something to eat or drink... #ELSE Looking through the front windows, you see that the cafe is currently very quiet, with almost all of the tables being empty. If you wanted to, you could go inside and get something to eat or drink... #ENDIF

Deciding that you'd like to take a break, you push open the door to the cafe and step inside. Noticing your entry, one of the waitresses hurries over to greet you, before leading you over to an empty table next to one of the windows. Handing you a menu, she informs you that all food and drink must be paid for at the moment of order, before flashing you a sunny smile and rushing over to another table which requires her attention.

Calling over the waitress, you place an order for [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1], before handing over the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_2] flames she asks of you. Having received the payment, she hurries off into the kitchen, before returning to your table and placing the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] down in front of you. Flashing you a cheery smile, she then quickly turns around and hurries off to another table which requires her attention.

#IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Relaxing in your comfortable chair, you make small-talk with [com.name] as you [#SPECIAL_PARSE_3] your [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1]... #ELSE Relaxing in your comfortable chair, you gaze out of the cafe's window and do some people-watching as you [#SPECIAL_PARSE_3] your [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1]... #ENDIF

Having received the payment, she hurries off into the kitchen, before returning to your table and placing the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] down in front of [com.name]. Flashing the two of you a cheery smile, she then quickly turns around and hurries off to another table which requires her attention.

Relaxing in your comfortable chair, you make small-talk with [com.name] as [com.she] [#SPECIAL_PARSE_3] [com.her] [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1]...

Deciding that you'd like to take a look inside one of the shops, you approach the entrance to the nearest building. In order to display yet more slaves to passing customers, you see that a series of large glass windows have been installed into the walls before you. As you walk up to the entrance, some of the slaves standing behind these windows glance your way; no doubt wondering if you'll be their next owner.

Pushing open the door, you step inside the shop, and find that the interior is surprisingly clean, well-lit, and airy. Yet more slaves line the walls around you, and in the middle of the room, the shop's owner cries out a greeting from behind a circular wooden desk.

After browsing the wares for a moment, you decide that you've had enough. After all, without a permit, you're unable to buy anything.

On the opposite side of the street to the Slavery Administration building, there's a timber-framed tavern bearing the name 'Bounty Hunter Lodge'. A sign near to the door declares it to be open twenty-four hours a day, seven days of the week, and is the best place in the city to find and hire bounty hunters willing to track down runaway slaves.

The bright lights shining out of the crooked old windows, combined with the loud sounds of merriment coming from within, informs you that there are a multitude of people currently inside. If you wanted to, you could step in through the open doors and take a look inside.
Pushing open the front door, you step into the establishment and take a look around...

The interior of the 'Bounty Hunter Lodge' takes the form of a large open-plan dining area, with a long wooden bar running along the far wall. The expansive floor area is filled with long wooden tables and benches, which are currently seating a large number of people of all different shapes and sizes. From the heady smell in the air and the inebriated shouts and laughter coming from the tavern's patrons, you can safely assume that a large portion of most bounty hunter's pay-checks are spent in here on alcohol.

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(silence)) Sitting all alone in one corner of the large hall, you see the familiar figure of Silence, the albino rat-girl whom you first met serving as one of Vengar's bodyguards. You wonder if you should head over and say something to her, or turn around and leave... #ELSE As you don't have any business with these bounty hunters, there's not much else you can do but turn around and leave... #ENDIF
Deciding that you've had enough of being in this place, you exit in the same way you entered, and soon find yourself standing back outside in Slaver Alley...

As you walk towards Slaver Alley's central courtyard, the excited buzz of hundreds of voices grows louder and louder. The source of this incessant din is hard to miss, and takes the form a huge, bustling crowd, which has surrounded a raised wooden platform. Several noticeboards, elevated above the heads of the energetic mob by means of tall poles, declare this area to be for 'Public Auctions'.

#IF(pc.isHasSlaverLicense()) Being in possession of a slaver's license, you wonder if you should approach the stage and participate in the next auction. #ELSE The noticeboards also declare that you'd need a slaver license in order to participate in any auctions, so, not being in possession of one yourself, there'd be no point in approaching the stage. #ENDIF

You make your way through the pressing crowds and take your place on the outskirts of the main bidding area. The information boards in this section seem to carry quite a lot more detail than those on the outskirts of the courtyard, and upon reading one, you discover a little more about the slaves that are on offer here.

According to the notice board, the vast majority of slaves are bought and sold by through the stores that scattered throughout slaver alley, but in the cases of a slave owner's assets being seized, or if a slave owner somehow ends up being enslaved themselves, all slaves that they owned are put up for public auction. It also states that some slaves willingly sell themselves in order to pay off their debts, and offering themselves up at a public auction is apparently a popular choice for those individuals.

Attached to the bottom of each of the noticeboards is a list of the slaves that are up next for the public auction. After reading through the list of names, you wonder if you should stick around to place a bid on any of them...

You can import any of your previously exported characters in order to add them to the auctioning list. (Export any character in the game by viewing their character sheet and pressing the little export button in the top-right of the screen.)

The collection of twenty-or-so public stocks, positioned right in the middle of a wide courtyard, is the first thing anyone sees when entering Slaver Alley. Used as a means of punishment for disobedient slaves, each one of the devices consists of a wooden frame, with holes for securing the occupant's arms and head. A small sign positioned next to each one informs members of the public as to what kinds of use have been permitted by the slave's owner.

Although more than half of the stocks are currently occupied, most of the slaves are locked up just as a means of humiliating them, and are clearly marked as being unavailable for public use. Not all of the slaves are so lucky, however, as you see that a few of them are marked as being publicly available for one type of penetration or another.
